meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful crinums.
meanings.sent2: I planted some crinums in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The crinums in the garden seemed to be dancing in the breeze.

meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the crinums brightened up the whole yard.

meanings.sent1: We saw many crinums at the flower show.
meanings.sent2: The crinums in the vase added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.sent4: The crinums stood together, united in their beauty.
